author: gshimansky
msg: Applied HARMONY-2271 [drlvm][kernel.tests] Kernel test SystemTest fails on win32 when there is an empty environment variable set
Tests passed on winxp. Since other platforms are not affected no more testing was done. Test works just fine with environment variables which have empty values.
